name: CO2Watch
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. o. two watch
des: This skill reports the daily CO2 reading from the Mauna Loa Observatory in Hawaii and compares it to previous readings. The Mauna Loa Observatory has been taking atmospheric CO2 measurements since 1958 and has demonstrated how CO2 levels have steadily increased over the past 60 years.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
